text: He reminded her that they must abide by Roman custom, and dwell there with their relations. Her values were those of the materialist who assesses every human being in terms of fame, power and wealth. Francesco she despised for his dullness, his lack of initiative, his subservience to his uncle.
handwritten_text: He reminded her that they must abide by Roman custom, and dwell there with their relations. Her values were those of the materialist who assesses every human being in terms of fame, power and wealth. Francesco she despised for his dullness, his lack of initiative, his subservience to his uncle.
